title: Riot help pls. Login Screen won't load..
body:
The Login screen only comes ups if i don't open any app after a restart. If i do then ill have to restart again. Sometimes it doesnt even work even when i restart so ill have to restart multiple times. I saw someone posted a similar problem and some riot workers gave them a guide, but i did everything in the permissions guide (https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)  and it still doesnt work. League worked perfectly fine for me until the recent patch. I even reinstalled/repaired the game and nothing works. I disabled antivirus, checked hardware, updated everything, ran as admin but nothing works.

*Yes I even tried the task manager end process/end process tree thing and tried opening the client as admin again but it still doesnt work.
*Yes i even did the delete lolairclient folders in RADS before i reinstalled from scratch.

IM SO FREAKIN FRUSTRATED. HELP PLS.

replies.body: Can you confirm whether you're able to patch but the *Launch* button won't bring up the login screen, or if you're having issues even having the patcher come up to download files prior to logging in.

im able to patch. it's just the launch button doesnt bring up the login screen. The task manager process says the client is running but on 15k memory. When i get it to work the client is at 150k ish memory.

Got it, thanks for confirming. So when you click on the *launch* button and nothing happens, it usually means your PC cannot reach the login servers. Follow our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are compatible with League.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
I tried everything but it still doesnt make a difference. How can this happen? i was perfectly fine before this patch..

There may be issues outside of your local network that are along your route to the servers. I suggest reaching out to our tech team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), making sure to attach a set of system logs with our [Hextech Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).
